objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#6A1B9A'/><circle cx='540' cy='400' r='500' fill='#8E24AA' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='200' cy='950' r='300' fill='#4A148C' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='850' cy='950' r='350' fill='#7B1FA2' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='100' fill='#00C853' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='950' cy='250' r='120' fill='#00E676' opacity='0.3'/><g opacity='0.4'><circle cx='200' cy='400' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='350' cy='200' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='700' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='850' cy='350' r='35' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='400' cy='500' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='600' cy='300' r='15' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='750' cy='450' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='300' cy='650' r='35' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='500' cy='750' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='700' cy='650' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='850' cy='800' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g></svg>

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a playful and energetic layout designed for a children's bubble product. At the top, two bold headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") use large, all-caps fonts with contrasting colors—white and bright lime green—creating immediate visual impact. Below, a smaller subheading ("subheading") presents an enticing tagline in a clean, modern white font. The central element is a product image ("product_image") prominently centered, drawing attention with its bright green color. A bold price tag ("price") in lime green stands below, paired with a vivid call-to-action ("cta") in white over a deep purple rectangle ("cta_background").

**Color Palette:**
- Background Purple: #6A1B9A  
- Headline White: #FFFFFF  
- Highlight Lime Green: #AEEA00  
- Deep CTA Purple: #7B1FA2  
- Accent Circles: Various shades of green, purple, white with opacities between 0.3 and 0.7
product_color: The product image uses a playful, vibrant color palette to attract attention and convey fun. The primary base color is a bright translucent green (#7EF07E) used for the bottle, creating a fresh and energetic vibe. The label features a vivid mix of purple (#8B4CD8) and yellow (#FFD700) as highlights, making the "Gazillion Bubbles" text pop. The letters are bordered with green (#70C242), orange (#FF8A00), and blue-to-purple blends (#5941A9), adding depth. Accent colors from the bubbles include soft pastels like light blue (#ADD8E6) and lavender (#D8B7F2), blending fluidly into the background for a whimsical, dynamic composition.
